bio: Charles Dickens was an English novelist, short story writer, and essayist. He is best known for his novels A Christmas Carol, David Copperfield, Great Expectations, and A Tale of Two Cities. Dickens was also a prolific poet and essayist, and his works have been widely read and studied.
